com.qualcomm.hardware.modernrobotics

Class ModernRoboticsUsbServoController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qualcomm.hardware.ArmableUsbDevice
      • com.qualcomm.hardware.modernrobotics.ModernRoboticsUsbDevice
        • com.qualcomm.hardware.modernrobotics.ModernRoboticsUsbController
          • com.qualcomm.hardware.modernrobotics.ModernRoboticsUsbServoController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReadWriteRunnable.Callback, HardwareDevice, ServoController, RobotArmingStateNotifier, RobotUsbModule, GlobalWarningSource

    public final class ModernRoboticsUsbServoController
extends ModernRoboticsUsbController
implements ServoController
    Modern Robotics USB Servo Controller

    This is an implementation of ServoController.

    Use HardwareDeviceManager to create an instance of this class
